text: Otkuda by ty ni vykhodil, obrashchay litse svoye k zapretnoy mecheti, i vy, gde by ni byli, obrashchayte litsa vashi k ney, dlya togo, chtoby u tekh lyudey ne bylo spora s vami. A tekh iz nikh , kotoryye nechestivy, ne boytes'; boytes' Menya, dlya togo, chtoby Mne vpolne sovershit' Moi blagodeyaniya vam, i togda vy, mozhet byt', poydote pryamym putom
